approve_mask_description: To interact with Polygon Network, MATIC tokens are required to pay as gas fees. SmartPay allow users to pay gas fee on Polygon Network with MASK token.
approve_mask_question: Do you want to set MASK token as gas fee?
allow_mask_as_gas_token_description: Set MASK tokens to pay gas fee when interacting with Polygon Network.
create_a_new_wallet_desc: Create a new Mask wallet in Pop-up.
create_a_new_persona_desc: Create a new Persona in Pop-up.
created_smart_pay_wallet_description: Created a SmartPay Wallet on Ploygon network.
create_successfully_tips_owner: Management account of the SmartPay Wallet is {{owner}}.
can_only_receive_polygon_assets: Receives assets on Polygon Network ONLY
deploy_tips_title: What to know before SmartPay Wallet deployment:
deploy_tips_description_one: User need to deploy the SmartPay Wallet on Polygon Network before using it for blockchain interaction. Wallet that has not been deployed can receive assets, but cannot send any transactions.
deploy_tips_description_two: You can change management account of SmartPay Wallet. In Mask Network, both Persona and Mask Wallet can be authorized as management account.
deploy_tips_description_three: Users can use SmartPay Wallet (free gas fee and private key change) only on Polygon Network at the moment.
deploy_tips_description_four: This SmartPay Wallet can only receive assets on Polygon Network. Please do not use this address to receive assets from other EVM chains.
eligibility_description: You can follow Mask Network <Link>Twitter</Link> or <Discord>Discord</Discord> to participate in the event and get free qualification to have gas-free blockchain experiences with SmartPay. Soon we will publish the second batch of users participating in the test!
eligibility_query: Click <Link>here</Link> and fill the SmartPay Wallet whitelist application form.
erc_4337_features_title: The ERC-4337 will open the door to more creativity and more important features for wallet design.
erc_4337_features_two: More efficient and simpler signature algorithms (eg. Schnorr, BLS)
erc_4337_features_three: Post-quantum safe signature algorithms (eg. Lamport, Winternitz)
ineligibility_tips: Sorry, you are not in the free trial whitelist.
white_list_tips: You are in the trial whitelist.
personas_description: Create a SmartPay Wallet with your Twitter account.
setup_smart_pay_managed_account: Set up the Management Account for SmartPay Wallet
smart_pay_description: SmartPay is based on ERC-4337 and is currently deployed on Polygon Network. Multiple chains will be supported in the future. ERC-4337 is a new wallet proposal that would open the door for creativity in wallet design and could provide more important features. And we will design more fascinating features based on the new wallet proposal in Mask Network.
setup_smart_pay_title: You need to know before using SmartPay:
setup_smart_pay_one: Your smart contract wallet is only deployed on Polygon Network for now. Please do not receive funds on other chains with the same address. We will support more chains in the future.
setup_smart_pay_two: Free gas experience in Mask Network’s dApps like Lucky Drop, ITO and Tips.
setup_smart_pay_three: Your private key and Json file can only be used in SmartPay.
remain_mask_tips: MASK token can be used to pay gas fee.
remain_times_tips_one: The Twitter account above remains {{count}} time to create SmartPay Wallet.
remain_times_tips_other: The Twitter account above remains {{count}} times to create SmartPay Wallet.
